com.mousebird.maply

Class ShapeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mousebird.maply.ShapeManager

  • public class ShapeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The Shape Manager is used to create and destroy geometry for shapes like circles, cylinders and so forth. It's entirely thread safe (except for destruction).
